name: Cluster Space
description:
Cluster Space

is an arcade-like game that I created as a YouTube project.

If you are a German viewer, you are welcome to watch it on my channel. You can find the link to the channel on my itch.io page.

The gameplay is kept very simple. You basically just have to try to think as long as you can. You also have to dodge various enemies - some are faster, others are slow to overtake. In order to survive more skillfully, you should not forgo collecting items! There are 5 items in this game:

  • Heart //+1 life
  • Asteroid // removes all enemies from the planet
  • Strength // You are invulnerable for a short time
  • Bomb // Removes enemies in a specified radiusGrenade // Fire burst of 3 grenades

By the way - the game has an online leaderboard.

Try to beat the high score and climb to the first place.

If you have any suggestions for improving the game, feel free to let me know.
